name: A Dungeon Crawler: A Dungeon Crawler Jam Dungeon Crawler

description:
Sadly I missed uploading some text files resulting in the character randomiser not working. 

Unzipping this and adding the Assets folder to the same folder as the executable will allow the randomiser to work properly:   https://drive.google.com/file/d/1JDu_aUCRY1IKRXwGpOSBViJ8Z--YvWeD/view?usp=shari...
